name: You Have One Task: Sell!
description:
"You Have One Task: Sell!" Is a game where you buy materials, then you build items with this material, so you can earn money and pass for the next level.

There are 8 levels in total, the game was made during 6 weeks,  I loved work in this project!

This is my first project, so, I had a lot os doubts, but... I give my best during this time :)!
